betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[warn]StoneLegion Players: Anchor / Chunkloading Advice![/warn]

[note]Please be careful when using Anchors/Chunkloaders. They are our main method of chunk loading on the server, and we ask that you only use them when necessary to help reduce lag.

We suggest using Personal Anchors before Passive Anchors. If you log off, Personal Anchors will shut down, which prevents them from causing lag and other issues. In contrast, Passive Anchors remain online until the server resets.

We do not allow World Anchors, so please never use or place them. They always start up when the server does, which is very bad for performance.

One last suggestion: when you get into heavy automation, especially with systems like Applied Energistics 2 (AE2), partially loading the system can cause many problems. For performance reasons, you should either keep the entire system loaded or not load it at all.

Pro-tip: You can use levers on your anchors to turn them off and save fuel![/note]


Let's craft a personal chunkloader. It will load a 3x3 chunk area. You need ender fragments, ender pearls, or coins to power the chunkloader. 

Personal anchors can be powered with ender fragments for 1h, ender pearls for 4 hours, and a varying amount depending on the coin used. 

Personal Anchors§r are loaded once the owner visits, and stays loaded while the player is logged in.

Passive Anchors§r are loaded once the owner visits, and stays loaded until the server resets.

World Anchors§r are always loaded, even after a server reset.
